title: Wakame seaweed salad with miso dressing
description: A wonderfully unique Asian salad of seaweed and wild mushrooms topped with a miso dressing. Perfect if you are feeling a little adventurous!
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz dried wakame seaweed, soaked in cold water for 20 minutes, then drained and rinsed
20g/¾oz dried wood ear mushrooms, soaked in warm water for 20 minutes, then drained, rinsed and finely shredded
½ Granny Smith apple, cored and cut into matchsticks
1 small handful of coriander roots, thinly sliced
1 handful of coriander leaves, to garnish
